Where is the documentation issue located?

## ğŸ” Issue Type
- [ ] **Missing information** - Something important is not documented
- [ ] **Incorrect information** - Documentation contains errors
- [ ] **Unclear explanation** - Existing docs are confusing
- [ ] **Outdated content** - Documentation is out of sync with code
- [ ] **Typo/Grammar** - Language or formatting issues
- [ ] **Missing examples** - Need more code examples
- [ ] **Broken links** - Links don't work or go to wrong places

What does the current documentation say? (copy/paste or link)
